text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as 

the Tailte Éireann Act 2022 

(Commencement) (No.3) Order 2023. 

In this Order, “Act of 2022” means the Tailte Éireann Act 2022 (No. 50

title: and Schedule 2 of the Act of 2022 shall come into operation, insofar as they
heading: 4. The 24th day of March 2023 is appointed as the day on which section 5
text_raw:
4. The 24th day of March 2023 is appointed as the day on which section 5 
and Schedule 2 of the Act of 2022 shall come into operation, insofar as they 
relate to the repeal of - 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

section 69 of the Valuation Act 2001 (No. 13 of 2001), 

section 29 of the Ordnance Survey Act 2001 (No. 43 of 2001), 
and 

section 21 of the Registration of Deeds and Title Act 2006 (No. 
12 of 2006). 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the 
Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage, 

15 March, 2023. 

FIONA QUINN, 

A person authorised under section 15 
of the Ministers and Secretaries Act 
1924 to authenticate the seal of the 
Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [117] 3

title: and Schedule 2 of the Act of 2022 shall come into operation, insofar as they
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 1(2) of the Tailte Éireann Act 2022 (No. 
50 of 2022), this Order appoints the days on which certain provisions of the 
Act come into operation.
